name: Ron Wyatt
text: They folks at Sunbelt helped us in our time of need, our disaster response trailer had a broken hub. They helped installing the new hub, bearings and seals and repacked the bearings on the other three wheels. It was a true blessing. Thank you to everyone at Sunbelt!!!

name: Ron Wyatt
text: They folks at Sunbelt helped us in our time of need, our disaster response trailer had a broken hub. They helped installing the new hub, bearings and seals and repacked the bearings on the other three wheels. It was a true blessing. Thank you to everyone at Sunbelt!!!

text: They folks at Sunbelt helped us in our time of need, our disaster response trailer had a broken hub. They helped installing the new hub, bearings and seals and repacked the bearings on the other three wheels. It was a true blessing. Thank you to everyone at Sunbelt!!!

name: Ron Wyatt
text: They folks at Sunbelt helped us in our time of need, our disaster response trailer had a broken hub. They helped installing the new hub, bearings and seals and repacked the bearings on the other three wheels. It was a true blessing. Thank you to everyone at Sunbelt!!!

name: ALABAMA SHINE
text: This place is unprofessional in customer service and products are defective.  I don’t recommend them to anyone.   I called about a defective product and there so called team leader was not professional and I drove over 25 miles one way.  I know this is only store for these products but once out the door and u leave.   It’s yours So beware of what they recommend and google it first then save money order the product on eBay or Amazon

resp.text: We apologize that we didn't meet your expectations. We have thousands of different products and we try to only carry the best products available, but even the best products sometimes have issues. We will be happy to exchange the product for you or if you would like to discuss it further please feel free to call us and ask for the Director of Operations.

name: Oleta Bruner
text: Love it best in the state of alabama

name: David Goodwin
text: Great uniforms , custom badges , gun belts an accessorys , custom name tags etc,etc

resp.text: Thank you David. We are happy to have you as a customer!

name: Stephanie Agee
text: Everything was okay

name: Josh Hillman
text: Central Fire Protection handles all our fire sprinkler and alarm needs.  Great company to do business with!!

name: Ethan Sullens
text: Courteous, friendly and prompt service.

name: Hilario Rodriguez
text:
(Translated by Google) Chingó is my job

(Original)
Chingó es mi trabajo

name: jesse wilkins
text: Nice place.. Only place I've seen in mobile that has a wide variety of inventory of communications equipment.. DOWNSIDE IS THEY DO NOT SELL TO THE PUBLIC..

name: Bryan Chambers
text: Awesome people and always friendly and willing to help in any way,  as a local home security business owner . Cerberus home security llc in elberta AL is proud to do business with ADI

name: alarmrat
text: Always helpful and quick. Good location

name: Jimmy Moore
text: Always a pleasure doing business here.  The staff are very personable and friendly.  They are our vendor of choice for most of the materials we need.

name: John Smith
text: I had a great experience with Buford’s. JD (I think his name was) was quick and efficient. He also did a great job of communicating with me throughout the process of ordering me a new key fob and coming to my house to program it. Additionally, he came in UNDER budget! That’s never happened to me with a locksmith before. Very impressed!

name: Elroyce Williams
text: My experience with Buford has always been a pleasant one. They are professional and helpful with timely advice and repairs that you don't have too return for them to get it right. They get it right the first time...

name: Ashley Harris
text:
Always knowledgeable and willing to go the extra mile (pun intended).
Staff is always courteous and friendly.

name: Teisa Teonna
text: I called them to my location and they was out there in less than 10 minutes. The gentleman was able to unlock my car doors in seconds, professional and proficient.

name: Hannah Berman
text: Used this company to replace a front door knob. Technician was great but walked off with my extra key and told me to pick it up at the office. Showed up to the office, but I was two minutes late. Woman came out with an attitude telling me they were closed, yelled at me about not having paid when I paid yesterday, and the technician had the key in his van, so both our times were wasted, even though I paid for the service and the technician had my key. I will spend the $5 to have my own copy made just not to deal with this place again.

name: Seth Lockett
text: They literally saved me hundreds of dollars!!!! I highly recommend this company! Fast, friendly service with a very knowledgeable staff.

name: Justin Russell
text: Got us back up and running with access to our tools in 15 minutes! These people are amazing

name: bird 23gut
text: Excellent, friendly customer service and quick  response time.

name: Randie Watkins
text: I just called and the lady that answered the phone was rude as heck. I will not be using this company.

name: Ann C
text: I had to have a new fob for my Lexus. I ordered a fob to be programmed trying to save money. JD came out & programmed my bought fob. It only unlocked to doors when done. It was raining, late in the evening... close to 6 pm, and I was completely exhausted. JD went above and beyond. He went back to the office, got me a good fob came back & programmed it. He was very patient & went above & beyond the call of duty. Thank you JD. Buford's you ROCK!!!

name: LaMeyah Law
text: I will recommend them to anyone. The guy who came out was very polite and understanding. So for that thank you thank you thank you !

name: Melba Ward
text: High, Expensive, Fast

name: Mary Smith
text: Call them out to open safe they opened the safe did not leave clear directions with combination cost$150.00 called them again because it would not open with the combination given came back out after multiple tries opened the safe wrote out directions even though he had trouble opening it cost $85.00 then on third call after multiple people attempted the combination left could not get into the safe they will come back out for another charge . Not happy at all they should come do the job correctly or explain the dial is messed up or something . Not recommended

name: Jessica Lopez
text: I was locked out in the rain and they were there in no time.  Thank you Buford's Locksmith

name: Shane Smith
text:
My wife and Daughter were in town for a volleyball turnement. My Daughter locked the key fob in the SUV. I called 5 other companies
That told me they couldn't get their employees
To answer their phone or they just didn't want
To work. So when JD answered and took care
Of my family within 30 minutes of calling him.
I was blown away with his quick response time. He was so nice it put mind at ease.

name: Jarvis Jones
text: The owner or whomever answered the phone with an attitude and talked with disrespect. Jacked the previous price of $400 to $500 because he was upset... Terrible professionalism. A freaking shame.

name: Johnbibby08 @gmail.com Tuscaloosa 06
text: Bufords Locksmith and Security great business to deal with affordable prices and fast customer service. I will be a repeat customer from now on. Thanks for the help today.

name: Kenneth Ridgell
text: Best response time in town, by far. Advanced in ability to work with even smart cars such as our Mercedes Benz. No one else in town would attempt to work on it and told me we were stuck until Monday. Thank God for professionals like this company!

name: Jayla Hargrove
text: The Worst Locksmith Company EVER.I Called For Service For My Car They Took My Information But No One Ever Showed Up I Waited A Hour & A Half For A Locksmith And He Never Called Or Nothing.This Is Very Unprofessional Please Do Better As A Company Too Take Care Of Your Customers..

name: Remy Helu
text: Great people great service great price!!

name: Lee R
text: Very professional in the service they provide. I hope I don't need keys for this vehicle again, but they are now my Go to company for key and security topics. I was not aware of all they provide untill this visit.

name: william ivory
text: Great job

name: Jasmyne “FatGirlish” bay
text: So helpful!!!! I called them 10 mins before closing asking if I could come in for a new replacement key. She told me come on! I get there and was told I would need my car to get new key programmed.. well I didn't have my car because I broke the only key I had for the car! In complete dispar one of the guys came out and asked if I had the key that broke I almost screamed yes.. he says well we can take the chip out of that one and put it in a new key!!! I almost hugged him!! lol I had just left a dealership that was trying to charge me $175 for a new key and never told me this could have been an option!! I walked out of there at 5:05 with a new key that's works!!! Thanks so much guys!!

name: Brandon Owens
text: Kept getting different times in when they would arrive.  Never showed before getting a commitment out of another locksmith.

name: Derek Wong
text: Professional and Reasonable priced, highly recommend.

name: Jordan Alexander
text: If I ever get locked out of my apartment again (hopefully not), I'm calling them.

name: Renee Rivera
text: Quick and easy .

name: Yasemin Webb
text: 0 customer  service
